sentences.sContent: Xia has created a mediaeval town full of elf princesses and knights, a busy modern city with young students pursuing dreams, and a quiet ancient town with innocent children and mysterious legends.
sentences.sContent_eng: Xia has created a mediaeval town full of elf princesses and knights, a busy modern city with young students pursuing dreams, and a quiet ancient town with innocent children and mysterious legends.
sentences.sCn: 夏达的笔下有满是精灵公主和武士的中世纪小镇，有青年学生逐梦的繁华都市，有生活着一群天真儿童，蕴藏神秘传说的宁静古镇。

sentences.sContent: When I was done with the bar, I worked as a hospital porter, a market research cold-caller, an elf in Santa's Grotto in Harrods and a runner in a porno post-production company.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I was done with the bar, I worked as a hospital porter, a market research cold-caller, an elf in Santa's Grotto in Harrods and a runner in a porno post-production company.
sentences.sCn: 结束了在咖啡店的工作之后，我又做了医院的搬运工、市场研究部门的问卷生、哈罗斯百货公司里撒旦洞穴中的小精灵、一家三级片后期制作公司的运作者。

words.tran: 如小精灵的；好恶作剧的；小妖精的；顽皮的

trans.tranOther: an imaginary creature like a small person with pointed ears and magical powers
